textBeforeTable: Spend miles International Flights Redeeming your miles on Virgin Australia The modern and stylish Virgin Australia lounges features a menu designed by chef Luke Mangan and a premium selection of beverages, as well as complimentary WiFi and business services. Virgin Australia offers guests three cabin classes on international long haul flights: Business Class, Premium Economy and Economy. On international short haul flights guests can enjoy: Business Class, Premium Economy (available on selected flights) and Economy. On domestic flights guests have a choice of either Business Class or Economy. Find out more about our partnership with Virgin Australia. Virgin Australia
